targets.query: SELECT sum("confirmed") FROM "jhu_covid" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "province" fill(null)

SELECT sum("confirmed") FROM "jhu_covid" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "province" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(first("confirmed"), $time_resolution) FROM "jhu_covid" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($time_resolution), "province" fill(null)
